radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis without focal consolidation; gallbladder shows layering increased density within the lumen suggestive of sludge; fluid-filled appendix measuring 1.3 cm with significant surrounding fat stranding and fascial thickening; hyperemia and thickening of the cecum; multiple reactive lymph nodes in the right lower quadrant; trace free fluid in the pelvis; normal appearance of other abdominal organs.
